articles.title: Xiaomi Fan Festival 2024: Check discounts on Xiaomi 14, Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G and more - HT Tech
articles.description: Xiaomi Fan Festival 2024 has begun in India, marking the 14th anniversary of the global brand. The festival offers discounts on a wide range of Xiaomi and Redmi products, including smartphones, Smart TVs, and AIoT devices.
